text: Naoki Shimura (born 27 November 1941) is a Japanese ski jumper. He competed in the normal hill and large hill events at the 1964 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Japan Category:Ski jumpers at the 1964 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Hokkaido
title: Naoki Shimura
